name: NeoDelta: The Conglomerate (Beta)
description:
In the year 2036, 

NEO-DELTA the world's largest conglomerate, which specializes in military goods and scientific development has dominated the world economy by creating new currency system. 
Bringing the world closer to a debt-free, peaceful state.
However the company has a special team which has been working on developing special mutagens, to evolve humankind even 
further.
The project is successful but they kept it a secret and named the evolved humans neo-humans. With the project's success they decided to wipe out humanity and replace it with neo-humans.

As the fate would have it, "Felix" a neo human is the only one who stands between The Conglomerate and Mankind.

The project is in Beta phase and will be updated once every 2 weeks.

Note:

If you are not sure which file to download then go for x86 file :) have fun
